Detailed Description

cvmx_srio::_imsg_vport_thr2

SRIO_IMSG_VPORT_THR2 = SRIO Incoming Message Virtual Port Additional Threshold

The SRIO Incoming Message Virtual Port Additional Threshold Register

Notes: Additional vport thresholds for SRIO MACs 2 and 3. This register is only used in SRIO0 and is only used when the QLM0 is configured as x1 lanes or x2 lanes. In the x1 case the maximum number of VPORTs is limited to 44. In the x2 case the maximum number of VPORTs is limited to 46. These values are ignored in the x4 configuration. This register can be accessed regardless of the value in SRIO(0,2..3)_STATUS_REG.ACCESS and is not effected by MAC reset.

Clk_Rst: SRIO(0,2..3)_IMSG_VPORT_THR sclk srst_n
